ja463:3.1: aggīva suriyova → aggi suriyo ca (sya1ed, sya2ed); aggīva sūriyo (mr)
ja463:5.1: dadhīva khīraṁva → dadhiṁva khīraṁva (bj); dadhi ca khīrañca (sya1ed, sya2ed); dadhiṁ va khīraṁ (pts-vp-pli1)
ja463:12.4: baḷavāmukhīti → vaḷavāmukhīti (bj); balavāmukhīti (sya1ed, sya2ed, mr); vaḷabhāmukhīti (pts-vp-pli1)
